author: Michael Sheetz
title: Top GE analyst Tusa sees pension freeze as sign of 'more cuts' coming to reduce debt
description: Tusa, the most bearish analyst on GE's stock, has gained a following in recent years.
content:
General Electric's announcement that it is freezing pension plans for about 20,000 U.S. employees is part of the company's "next steps in the balance sheet unwind," J.P. Morgan analyst Stephen Tusa wrote on Monday.
While the pension freeze helps cut some of … [+2457 chars]
